_description: ‘The Poet’s Repentance’, expressing repentance for speaking ill of women in song — six 12-line alliterative stanzas (ababababcdcd)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Weping haueþ myn wonges wetFor wikked werk ant wone of
                    wyt…
BLHar2253.Last Lines: …Selþe be him sentIn londe of leuedis alle
BLHar2253.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of MS.
